backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with access control, blob storage mixins, and all social data types and maps for profiles, posts, comments, stories, messages, and conversations.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking feature IDs to frontend files, components, and test IDs for scrollable select dropdown enhancements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten short summaries for numerous frontend files describing their roles in the app’s UI, logic, and data flows.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH theme variables for light/dark modes and applying global background and border styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/ops/production-deployment-retry: Runbook describing steps to retry production deployment of Draft Version 4 without code changes.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component handling authentication state, loading behavior, and showing either SignIn, profile setup, or the main AppShell.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Main application shell with header, page routing via internal state, bottom navigation, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/AvatarImage.tsx: Avatar component that renders user/character avatars with cache-busted URLs, retry logic, and fallback initials.
frontend/src/components/CharacterFormDia: Dialog component for creating or editing a character, including name, bio, and avatar upload with progress tracking. Handles form submission, validation, and avatar preview.
frontend/src/components/CommentsPanel.ts: Displays and sorts comments for a post and provides a form to submit new comments as the user or a character. Fetches profiles and handles comment creation.
frontend/src/components/CreateConversati: Dialog for creating a new conversation by selecting characters to chat with. Manages character selection and submits the new conversation.
frontend/src/components/CreateStoryDialo: Dialog for creating a story post with an image, caption, and author selection. Handles image upload, preview, and story submission.
frontend/src/components/MessageThread.ts: Displays messages in a conversation with auto‑scrolling and sender selection for new messages. Supports sending messages and viewing updated conversation data.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Renders a social post with author info, text, image, like button, and expandable comments section. Handles like actions and fetches author profiles.
frontend/src/components/PostComposer.tsx: UI component for creating posts with text, optional image upload, author selection, and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog for initial user profile setup allowing name entry and saving via mutation.
frontend/src/components/ScrollableSelect: Custom scrollable select wrapper that shows scroll buttons based on viewport scroll position.
frontend/src/components/StoriesRow.tsx: Displays a horizontally scrollable row of stories with a create button and opens dialogs for creating or viewing stories.
frontend/src/components/StoryViewerDialo: Dialog that shows a full-screen story with author info, timestamp, image, and caption.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance, updating it when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity authentication context providing login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for user profiles, characters, posts, conversations, and related mutations using an actor backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, scrollbars, and scrollable select components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Characters.tsx: Displays a list of characters with creation, editing, and deletion features using character-related queries.
frontend/src/pages/HomeFeed.tsx: Shows the post feed with stories, composer, loading skeletons, and sorted posts.
frontend/src/pages/Messages.tsx: Lists conversations, supports creating chats, and opens message threads for selected conversations.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: Renders user profile settings, including updating name, bio, and avatar with form handling and mutations.
frontend/src/pages/SignIn.tsx: React sign‑in page using Internet Identity with a styled login button and branding elements.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config extending colors, typography, animations, and layout utilities with plugins.
project_state.json: JSON state describing project version, issues, and feature requests related to improving long-list scrolling in selection components.
